akn:section.akn:heading: Agreement with the Marine Debris Foundation

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary may offer to enter into an agreement, which may include a grant or cooperative agreement, under which the Marine Debris Foundation established under title I 11 See References in Text note below. may administer the prize competition.
(b) Requirements An agreement entered into under subsection (a) shall comply with the following requirements:
